questiontext.text:
Determine the centroid of the above section

x = {1:NUMERICAL:=10:1#Good job!~*#Sorry. Try again.} mm

y = {1:NUMERICAL:=10:1#Good job!~*#Sorry. Try again.} mm

Iy = {1:NUMERICAL:=6397:1#Good job!~*#Sorry. Try again.} mm4

for a circle Ix is equal to Iy.
